item.title: Events
item.author: info@ldaca.edu.au (Language Data Commons of Australia)
item.description: Forthcoming Workshops Previous Workshopsâ€ƒWebinars Advice for researchers Forthcoming Workshops Introduction to Computational Text Analytics Do you have more text than you know what to do with? Did you collect data including text for your project and now feel overwhelmed when you try to analyse? Is there too much? Are you doing the same thing over and over again and feeling like you’re not using your time efficiently? Are you worried about missing the forest for the trees (or the trees for the forest)?
